description:
IzPack is a widely used tool for packaging applications on the Java platform as cross-platform installers. 

Easily make installers that work seamlessly on Microsoft Windows™, Linux™, Solaris™ and Mac OS X™. 

* [FAQ](http://docs.codehaus.org/display/IZPACK/FAQ+-+Frequently+asked+questions)
* [User](http://docs.codehaus.org/display/IZPACK/User+documentation)
* [Developer](http://izpack.org/developers/)
summary: Cross-platform tool for packaging applications on the Java platform
author: Julien Ponge
